title: SF424 Mandatory Form
description: Standard Form 424 - Application for Federal Assistance (Mandatory Fields)

typeOfSubmission.title: 1.a. Type of Submission
typeOfSubmission.description: Select one type of submission in accordance with agency instructions. This field is required.

otherSubmissionTypeExplanation.title: Other (specify)
otherSubmissionTypeExplanation.description: Specify the type of submission in the text box.

frequency.title: 1.b. Frequency
frequency.description: Select the applicable frequency for the type of submission. This field is required.

otherFrequencyExplanation.title: Other (specify)
otherFrequencyExplanation.description: Specify the frequency of the submission.

consolidatedRequest.title: 1.c. Consolidated Application/Plan/Funding Request?
consolidatedRequest.description: Indicate if the submission is a consolidated application/plan/funding request.

consolidatedRequestExplanation.title: Consolidated Application/Plan/Funding Request Explanation
consolidatedRequestExplanation.description: If this is a Consolidated Application/Plan/Funding Request, please identify the programs covered by the consolidated submission as required in agency instructions.

version.title: 1.d. Version
version.description: Select the applicable version for the type of submission. This field is required.

applicantIdentifier.title: 3. Applicant Identifier
applicantIdentifier.description: If you wish to use a unique identification number for your own purposes, enter it here.

federalEntityId.title: 4a. Federal Entity Identifier
federalEntityId.description: Enter the number assigned to your organization by the Federal agency.

federalAwardId.title: 4b. Federal Award Identifier
federalAwardId.description: Enter the award number previously assigned by the Federal agency, if any.

dateReceivedState.title: 5. Date Received by State
dateReceivedState.description: Enter the date received by the State, if applicable. Enter in the format mm/dd/yyyy.

stateApplicationId.title: 6. State Application Identifier
stateApplicationId.description: Enter the identifier assigned by the State, if applicable.

legalName.title: a. Legal Name
legalName.description: Enter the legal name of the applicant that will undertake the assistance activity. This field is required.

einTin.title: b. Employer/Taxpayer Identification Number (EIN/TIN)
einTin.description: Enter either TIN or EIN as assigned by the Internal Revenue Service. If your organization is not in the US, enter 44-4444444. This field is required.

samUei.title: c. UEI
samUei.description: UEI of the applicant organization. This field is pre-populated from the Application cover sheet.

street1.title: Street1
street1.description: Enter the first line of the Street Address. This field is required.

street2.title: Street2
street2.description: Enter the second line of the Street Address.

city.title: City
city.description: Enter the City. This field is required.

state.title: State
state.description: Select the state, US possession or military code from the provided list. This field is required if Country is the United States.

country.title: Country
country.description: Select the Country from the provided list. This field is required.

zipPostalCode.title: Zip / Postal Code
zipPostalCode.description: Enter the nine-digit Postal Code (e.g., ZIP code). This field is required if the country is the United States.

departmentName.title: Department Name
departmentName.description: Enter the name of primary organizational department, service, laboratory, or equivalent level within the organization which will undertake the assistance activity.

divisionName.title: Division Name
divisionName.description: Enter the name of primary organizational division, office, or major subdivision which will undertake the assistance activity.

contactPerson.title: f. Name and contact information of person to be contacted on matters involving this submission

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Select the Prefix from the provided list or enter a new Prefix not provided on the list.

firstName.title: First Name
firstName.description: Enter the First Name. This field is required.

lastName.title: Last Name
lastName.description: Enter the Last Name. This field is required.

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: Select the Suffix from the provided list or enter a new Suffix not provided on the list.

organizationalAffiliation.title: Organizational Affiliation
organizationalAffiliation.description: Enter the Organizational Affiliation of the person to contact on matters related to this application.

telephoneNumber.title: Telephone Number
telephoneNumber.description: Enter the daytime Telephone Number. This field is required.

email.title: Email
email.description: Enter a valid Email Address. This field is required.

typeOfApplicant.title: 8a. TYPE OF APPLICANT
typeOfApplicant.description: Select the appropriate applicant type code. This field is required.

otherApplicantTypeExplanation.title: Other (specify)
otherApplicantTypeExplanation.description: If you selected "Other" in 8a, specify your applicant type here.

additionalDescription.title: b. Additional Description
additionalDescription.description: Enter a secondary description of applicant type, if required by the agency.

nameOfFederalAgency.title: 9. Name of Federal Agency
nameOfFederalAgency.description: Pre-populated from the Application cover sheet.

assistanceListingNumber.title: 10. Assistance Listing Number
assistanceListingNumber.description: Pre-populated from the Application cover sheet.

assistanceListingTitle.title: Assistance Listing Title
assistanceListingTitle.description: Pre-populated from the Application cover sheet.

descriptiveTitleOfApplicantProject.title: 11. Descriptive Title of Applicant's Project
descriptiveTitleOfApplicantProject.description: Enter a descriptive title of the project. This field is required.

areasAffectedByFunding.title: 12. Areas Affected by Funding
areasAffectedByFunding.description: Enter areas or entities affected using categories specified in the agency instructions.

applicant.title: a. Applicant
applicant.description: Enter the Congressional District in the format: 2 character State Abbreviation - 3 character District Number. Examples: CA-005 for California's 5th district, CA-012 for California's 12th district. If outside the US, enter 00-000. This field is required.

project.title: b. Program/Project
project.description: Enter the Congressional District in the format: 2 character State Abbreviation - 3 character District Number. Examples: CA-005 for California's 5th district, CA-012 for California's 12th district. If all districts in a state are affected, enter "all" for the district number. Example: MD-all for all congressional districts in Maryland. If nationwide (all districts in all states), enter US-all. If the program/project is outside the US, enter 00-000.

startDate.title: a. Start Date
startDate.description: Enter the start date of the funding period for this submission. Enter in the format mm/dd/yyyy. This field is required.

endDate.title: b. End Date
endDate.description: Enter the end date of the funding period for this submission. Enter in the format mm/dd/yyyy. This field is required.

federal.title: a. Federal ($)
federal.description: Enter the dollar amount. This field is required.

submissionSubjectToReview.title: 16. IS SUBMISSION SUBJECT TO REVIEW BY STATE UNDER EXECUTIVE ORDER 12372 PROCESS?
submissionSubjectToReview.description: Applicants should contact the State Single Point of Contact (SPOC) for Federal Executive Order 12372 to determine whether the application is subject to the State intergovernmental review process. This field is required.
enum: a. This application was made available to the State under the Executive Order 12372 Process for review on
b. Program is subject to E.O. 12372 but has not been selected by the State for review
c. Program is not covered by E.O. 12372

stateReviewDate.title: State Review Date
stateReviewDate.description: Enter the date the submission was provided to the State for review. Enter in the format mm/dd/yyyy.

applicantDelinquentFederalDebt.title: 17. Is The Applicant Delinquent On Any Federal Debt?
applicantDelinquentFederalDebt.description: This question applies to the applicant organization, not the person who signs as the authorized representative. This field is required.

delinquentFederalDebtExplanation.title: Applicant Federal Debt Delinquency Explanation
delinquentFederalDebtExplanation.description: Provide an explanation of Delinquent Federal Debt in the text box.

iAgree.title: I Agree
iAgree.description: Check to select. This field is required.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Select the Prefix from the provided list or enter a new Prefix not provided on the list.

firstName.title: First Name
firstName.description: Enter the First Name. This field is required.

lastName.title: Last Name
lastName.description: Enter the Last Name. This field is required.

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: Select the Suffix from the provided list or enter a new Suffix not provided on the list.

title.title: Title
title.description: Enter the position title. This field is required.

organizationalAffiliation.title: Organizational Affiliation
organizationalAffiliation.description: Enter the Organizational Affiliation of the person to contact on matters related to this application.

telephoneNumber.title: Telephone Number
telephoneNumber.description: Enter the daytime Telephone Number. This field is required.

email.title: Email
email.description: Enter a valid Email Address. This field is required.

attachSupportingDocuments.title: Attach Supporting Documents
attachSupportingDocuments.description: Attach supporting documents as specified in agency instructions.

submissionSubjectToReview.const: a. This application was made available to the State under the Executive Order 12372 Process for review on
